It is now July 2013 and there are newer, fancier versions of the olympus tough cameras, but for me this camera has all the features I was looking for. Nice pictures (above and below water) and decent video. If you can fine this camera at a good price it is a nice starter camera that is water proof. I will be taking this camera to Disney in August- going to the water parks....

Reviews.Title: Worked for a few weeks, now has issues
Reviews.Author: northerngal
Reviews.Content: Camera takes nice pics, but after only a few weeks of use it wouldn't turn on all the time. (not so great when I happened to be on vacation at the time!) Sometimes it will turn on ONLY when the door is open (battery compartment)!! Well that's not so good, since you can't use it in water then! I've owned Olympus Tough for a few years now and love them, but am disappointed with this one...just got a lemon I guess.

Reviews.Title: Broke the first time we used it under water
Reviews.Author: Saunder Schroeder
Reviews.Content: Camera worked great until we used it under water. I was snorkeling (2-3 ft under water) when the camera broke. The power button just kept flashing and nothing would happen. I did take about 10 pictures before it broke, which were pretty descent quality, but nonetheless it still broke.

Reviews.Title: Good Waterproof/Shockproof camera
Reviews.Author: H. Parra
Reviews.Content: Went to Mexico and used this at the beach, my friends and I were impressed at the quality of pictures from this small short zoom camera.Waterproof worked well and I got great underwater shots and not a drop got through.Great buy if you have kids or just don't want to worry about breaking a camera, its 5 foot shock proof and waterproof so if you drop this in mud, sand, saltwater and you can just hose it off.Not the fastest snapping camera ever, it was great for group photos and landscapes.Battery life was a bit short and the battery is non replaceable and the power cord seemed propriety so a star off for that.Overall a good buy

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: John Shifflett
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my daughter who can't seem to keep one in working order for to long.So far she hasn't found a way to destroy this one. The picture quailty is great too.

Reviews.Title: Service technician tool
Reviews.Author: Friskers
Reviews.Content: Our company does remote site installations and mechanical service, typically in the bilge of tugboats and supply vessels.  Our technicians and engineers require a simple camera that is fairly tough.  We've lost one too many cell phones to drops and dunks while attempting to take pictures of an area of concern.  This little camera takes the place of having to pull out a cell phone.  It takes good pictures, is simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jen H
Reviews.Content: Took it with me on a cruise - used it while floating in the water.  The camera was often in the water and never had an issue. I had to remember to clean the lens (salt water) but otherwise it was great. I did find that the camera didn't seem to shut itself off after not being used for awhile so I went through the battery very quick the first day. The second day I made an effort to turn it off after use and didn't have that issue again.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected
Reviews.Author: Teena L. Myers
Reviews.Content: Brought this camera for a vacation to the Caribbean to take underwater pictures while snorkeling. Decided to leave my camcorder and Sony Camera at home and use this one for everything. It worked beautifully. The focus and processing are super fast compared to my Sony. 95% of the pictures I took were keepers with minor editing needed.

Reviews.Title: It works under the water!
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: In the beginning I was afraid to it to the beach and entering in the water with it , but it worked very good !! The only thing about this camera, is that the buttons are a little stiff, so you need to press them harder, maybe because it's a shock/water proof camera.I would recommend it to a friend!!! Very happy so far!!

Reviews.Title: love this!
Reviews.Author: mainegirl
Reviews.Content: My 8 YO got this for Xmas - she's clumsy and careless with things, and she drops this alot and it keeps on going! Only thing, remember to purchase a memory card separately. Doesnt come with one!

Reviews.Title: WET FUN!!!!
Reviews.Author: Johni
Reviews.Content: Went to South Beach with it and came back with over 3,000 pictures. PLUS, IT TAKES 3D PICS!!LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: cmn149
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera specifically for a vacation I was planning that would include snorkeling and kayaking, among other water activities. My original thought was to purchase a cheap, or disposable, camera that I would only use underwater while snorkeling, but couldn't find one that looked as though it would take quality photos. So I ended up purchasing this camera and using it both in and out of the water. It worked perfectly in the water, and the quality of the photos us good for a point and shoot. The photos I took while snorkeling did have a blue tint to them (which isn't surprising, for being underwater); I was able to easily correct this in photoshop for most of them. Only complaint is that the LCD screen was hard to see underwater.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: M1998
Reviews.Content: This camera was exactly what i was looking for! It works great in and out of the water. I am not expert photographer so this camera fit my price range and took pictures with quality up to my standards. I just brought it ln vacation and it worked great! It is skinny enough to fit in your pocket, its waterproof, and has a great zoom... I couldnt have asked for anything more! Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera to Bring Along
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  I recently bought it and brought it along on a fly fishing trip to Colorado.  It took great pictures of the surrounding scenery and of fish that we caught.  It is also an amazing underwater camera.  I took clear photos of trout underwater.  You can even see bubbles from the moving current in the pictures.  The underwater videos are great too and captures sound well.  Battery life is pretty good.  It only started to run out of battery at the end of a long day of fishing and taking lots of underwater pictures and videos.  It is light and easy to carry in a pocket or fishing vest.  I highly recommend this camera.  Never thought I would be able to take underwater pictures like this.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Broken two ways
Reviews.Author: kmac
Reviews.Content: After suffering multiple lens jams, I bought this as an alternative to a point and shoot with an extending lens.  The waterproof/shockproof was a bonus for me, as I've got two kids (one lens jam was a result of a child dropping a camera) and we spend a lot of time at the pool in the summer.I never even had the chance to get this in the water, so I can't weigh in on how it is waterproofed, because almost immediately one of my kids picked through the rubber backing covering the buttons on the camera.  I assume this would eliminate the ability to bring it into the water, as it was no longer sealed.  It was flimsy, at best.The next break was the LCD screen.  I had the camera in my pocket for about 15 minutes and when I pulled it out the screen on the back was damaged and broken to the point where it doesn't register pictures.  The camera suffered no shock nor pressure, I literally walked from one side of the mall to the other, so I have no idea what happened.  Perhaps it's just bad luck, but this is another camera has lasted me less than 7 months with VERY limited use.  I maybe took 200-300 pictures total.It has terrible battery life and has not served its purpose for me at all.  I would not purchase this camera again nor recommend it to anyone, and will be looking for something that lives up to the TOUGH name it's given.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof- but difficult buttons and annoying charging
Reviews.Author: Goldie Locks 5 "A mom with twins and an older...
Reviews.Content: I got this 2 years ago before our trip to Hawaii and it did a great job under water, taking some great pics - but the controls/buttons are not placed out easily to use (and it's not like i have huge hands or anything).I agree with the reviewers who complained about the special cable needed to charge - total BS if you ask me.  Annoyed with that.So i'm about to buy a new underwater camera - because I just don't want to deal with this one on our Disney trip - i'd like something the kids can use a little bit, too - and this one, with it's strange buttons, isn't it.

Reviews.Title: great for kids, not so great picture quality
Reviews.Author: GottaBounce
Reviews.Content: My kids each got this camera for Christmas. They are very pleased with them. They've taken them on hiking and exploring adventures. What is great about them is that they are shock proof and waterproof, so perfect for kids, although they haven't tested these features completely (so far, the cameras just got muddy and washed, which didn't cause any problems).What is not so great about them is the picture quality. The pictures looks fine at first, however when compared with my point and shoot Canon camera, the Olympus picture lacks sharpness. The colors were not quite as appealing as well.Also, there are some picture effects (line drawing, watercolor, etc.) that the kids are crazy about!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to go under water. leaked and they do not stand behind there camera they wanted me to spend 130 to fix it. do yourself a favor and do not buy this camera

Reviews.Title: The reviews helped and we are more than pleased with this fun camera!
Reviews.Author: DIANE Gillespie
Reviews.Content: After doing some research and reading reviews on the Olympus TG-320, I purchased it. The day we received it I played around with my daughters toys and took pictures in the bathtub, it worked great. Our vacation to the indoor water park really put the camera to the test. The battery lasted all day (make sure you change the setting to shut off at a shorter time limit), the underwater pictures were great and the NON under water pictures were clear and perfect. No leaks and no problems with the pictures. There are several fun effects to try out, even the videos came out fine. VERY great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very nice little camera
Reviews.Author: mj34232
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size camera to have around, easy to carry, very lightweight.  I keep it on the kitchen counter and grab it all the time to snap pictures in the back yard.  The only down side is not having a viewfinder but you really cannot find that anymore with cameras under $200.  I hope the companies work on the screen and being able to see in bright sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dina Becker
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It takes great pictures and there are no worries about damaging it with water or sand.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Lisi "~Lisi"
Reviews.Content: This camera was great, took beautiful pictures underwater. This was my first underwater camera. When it came, I thought perhaps they sent me the wrong item. It did not look like what I pictured. It looked like a normal camera. It wasn't bulky, didn't have a plastic protection.The year I purchased the camera I took it to the pool, the beach and to Dourney park in PA. It took quite the beating from my kids, we threw it to one another in the pool. They were excited to take pictures underwater.It took fantastic pictures underwater and out on dry land. It was small enough to fit in my back pocket. The only downside was the way it charges. It requires a different charger than normal and the kids couldn't see the pictures on the display in the car because I couldn't charge it. Right now, I can't find the charger, which is the only reason I remember about the battery.It is a good camera at a great price, but the charger is not ideal. I think it's a proprietary charger, whatever happened to making all chargers micro usb?

Reviews.Title: Overall good deal
Reviews.Author: Christopher webb
Reviews.Content: Great for anything near or in water. Picture quality isn't the best but what you lose in quality you gain in durability.

Reviews.Title: I have had 2 of 2  break on vacations snorkeling - very disappointing to come home with only a few pictures
Reviews.Author: r chan
Reviews.Content: This is ridiculous. I am writing to spare you the grief of coming home with no pictures (& I'm disgusted with Olympus).  I  don't ever write reviews, but I am writing now  after being turned down by Olympus to honor a warranty on a  this camera that was 2 months too late because I only use it only for occasional snorkeling/water vacations & the last one  fell 2 months too late.I have had it with Olympus cameras.  This was the second one to break, on the FIRST salt-water vacation.  And I don't believe I ever mishandled it.This camera CAN NOT take salt water, period.  I am not sure about fresh water.It's not worth any amount of money.Buy a GO PRO.  They are AWESOME & hold up very well.  They are worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing.
Reviews.Author: juliart "juliart"
Reviews.Content: I have had Olympus Film cameras and they have all been excellent but not this Digital one. The sound quality is poor. Makes a clanking noise which makes the natural sound unusable. Also the word TOUGH is a misnomer. It fell out of my pocket which is about 2 feet and landed on some dirt. Cracked the strobe plastic. Now it is useless underwater. I called Olympus and because it is over a year old they will not repair it. So if you drop it on a soft dirt or sand make sure you do it before the year is up. I would not recommend this Olympus TG-320 Tough to anyone even an enemy! Spend a little more and buy a Canon or Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: josegve
Reviews.Content: I  have  not used the camera in a hostile environment as yet so cannot comment on the "Tough" part. The rest is great. Videos are very sharp with good sound. The pictures are also up to mark for the camera specifications. Very satisfied with my purchase.Observation: Didn't give it 5 stars because one of its main features is being "Tough" and like I said I really haven`t dunked it in the pool yet.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expencting froma a waterproof dust proof shockproof camera....
Reviews.Author: moncho52
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to have it on the pocket while traveling, the idea was to have decent quality pictures with a lot of reliability (Not having to worrie about water/dust or drops)The reality is, although shockproof/waterproof this camera has: Not good quality pictures (I almost could say bad quality)and needs a Special cable for charging it.The worse of all was that it stopped working just a couple of days after warranty expired... (first the charging cable, then the camera)Maybe it was just bad luck, I would say don't buy cheap...

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY IF YOU WANT WATERPROOF
Reviews.Author: Tom Cody "TKC"
Reviews.Content: FIRST TIME USING THIS CAMERA UNDERWATER AND IT LEAKED. I TRIPLE CHECKED TO MAKE SURE IT WAS IN THE 'LOCKED' POSITION AND SAFE TO USE UNDERWATER. I WENT IN NO MORE THAN 3 FEET OF WATER AND IT LEAKED WATER INTO THE BATTERY AND SD CARD COMPARTMENT. ALSO, THE PICTURE QUALITY IS NONE TOO GOOD EITHER

Reviews.Title: tough as (paper) nails
Reviews.Author: Marcin Matusiak
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son. He is not a very keen photographer, but whenever he tries to use the TG-320 actively (on holidays) it fails. I have just send it to the manufacturer third time. The camera spent more time at the service center than in my home. It is still on warranty, but it costs time, effort, and shipment every time it breaks. One day the warranty will be gone, and I will be left with this piece of garbage.

Reviews.Title: Toughest camera I've ever met
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: I love these cameras, i have purchased well over 100 of them for my company. they are being phased out for a newer, more expensive one and i'm very sad about that. i cant tell you how many horrible things these cameras go though and still come out working like a champ. Dropped from heights, dropped in grease, skidding across rooftops, dropped in buckets of corrosive chemicals, thrown at walls, fallen on concrete/pavement/rock/puddles more then any little camera should be able to handle, but it does it and 9 times out of 10, they are fine. The screen cracks sometimes when something really bad happens to it, but it works even with a cracked screen usually.

Reviews.Title: Worked great until stolen in peru
Reviews.Author: LTCRET "real person"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons who went to Macho Picho (SP). Peruvian SOB'S stole it and my son did not think to take the memory card out. The card was the best part. So they got it all and all the pics, I  had put a really good 32GB card in it so they could shoot away. My son's are less critical than this old Army LTC. I would never have left the camera and memory (memories) in the same place. The boys really liked the camera and its water resistant features.

Reviews.Title: We love this camera
Reviews.Author: Joshua K.
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about this camera, when the weather is nasty/rainy/or we're at the beach in the humid salt spray we leave the phones in the safety of the truck and break this out without having to worry about it. It's taken some great pictures and stood up to some mild abuse being tossed around in bags and gear boxes. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works Great on the Water.
Reviews.Author: Lee D. Sudduth "ldsuds"
Reviews.Content: Great camera for taking those fishing shots to prove you caught the big fish. Works Great on the water or on shore as well.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I took it on vacation to the Caribbean with me and took wonderful underwater shots with it!

Reviews.Title: Needs work.
Reviews.Author: mary carroll
Reviews.Content: I'm slowly getting use this camera. I had a Fuji and found it much easier to use. The pictures come out fine but it seems to use up the batteries really fast.

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera!
Reviews.Author: Nathan Grossman
Reviews.Content: Works great underwater. Clear pictures in salt and fresh water. Long Battery life and very durable. Would highly reccomend this camera.

Reviews.Title: I like it, but it could use some improvement.
Reviews.Author: D. S. "Tigerfish313"
Reviews.Content: The focus on this camera is not amazing, even with the specific scenes set. It isn't bad though. There was one time that water leaked into the battery compartment, but I had left the camera soaking in the sink (as instructed) for far longer than the recommended 10 minutes. It hasn't happened since then, so I'm sure it was just due to the very extended time spent underwater, and it had no effect on the camera at all, so it turned out fine.

Reviews.Title: Winner for Field Use on a Budget
Reviews.Author: Debra Rarig
Reviews.Content: Needed a camera our engineering staff could take into the field, which means being subjected to the elements - rain, cold, dust, etc.  This model got the nod because of its rugged features, plus dual image stabilization, and good price - $120.  Slower recycle time than some other cameras considered - 1.8 sec vs. .8 sec on Nikon Coolpix AW100; not as fast a lens for low light situations as the Panasonic Lumix FH8 - f/3.9 vs. f/2.5; maybe not as easy to use as the other models according to some online reveiws, but I found it very easy to figure out and to find settings adjustment menus.  I own two other Olympus cameras - prosumer and DSLR types, but other staff do not, and have still found it to be easy to use on the go.  Clear winner for our purchasing budget.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Susan Shockey
Reviews.Content: This camera is way better than I ever expected takes great pictures and very very very clear also really durable

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Country girl
Reviews.Content: This is the most fun camera I have ever owned.  Take in the water point for a nice under water picture.  A little hard to see what you are taking pictures of but still fun pictures.

Reviews.Title: works well , but it was dropped  once and it broke
Reviews.Author: John Augustine
Reviews.Content: it may have been a fluke , I don't know it was friends came over used it and hand off went bad , dropped and glass broke on a marble patio about 5ft

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: GregB
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazingly good photographs, comparable to higher priced Canons and Nikons.  Not quite SLR quality though.  Video is okay, but sound quality is marginal.  Works great in rainy and cold conditions.  Have not submerged it in water, and don't intend to.  Worked well on photos while skiing at sub-freezing temps.  Only problem is that sometimes some of the images can't be read/ opened by my computer.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Johannes Drechsel
Reviews.Content: Nice camera but a little slow if you want to make a quick picture. Nether the less I like that the camera is robust

Reviews.Title: love love this camera
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: this is the second olympus TG series camera we own,it works great and takes great pictures, safe and will not break

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jen Murphy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a cruise, it takes great picture, the quality is great, I really like this camera. fast shipping

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Lentz
Reviews.Content: Works underwater well. BUT I don't like the quality of photos it takes out of water. I feel like its more of a 60 dollar camera rather then 120 dollar camera.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Tough camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago to replace my fujifilm camera that broke last year. I never tested this camera in the water thinking it would be waterproof because it says it is. I just got back yesterday from a Bahamas cruise and I used this camera. The 1st time I used it under water it was fine. Went boogie boarding with it. rinsed it with fresh water when I got out of the ocean. The 2nd time I used the camera, it wouldn't turn on when I was in the pool, once I got out of the pool, I opened up the battery door and there was water in it. I dried it out for a few hours and it worked. But Every time I wanted to take underwater photos, water still kept getting inside, I made sure the door was locked shut and that the tab was in the locked position, the inside of my camera is now carroded. Glad it lasted through my trip, took great pics, thats the only reason why it got three stars, otherwise, prob give it one or two.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Carvajal
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, nice color, size is good, i just would like the battery life was more longer, i even not try underwater.

Reviews.Title: Completely perfect for water sports!
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect if you are a water baby!  The only thing I would suggest is to include a memory card.  Add a few dollars to the price but save problems for gift givers!

Reviews.Title: No sand in my lense.
Reviews.Author: lidna
Reviews.Content: I have gone through several of the mid-range Olympus cameras in the last 5 years.  I don't want an expensive camera to worry about.  The Olympus is a good brand for me and I like the software.  My main problem was having the lens not extend or withdraw.  I think I solved the problem with this one!  And I didn't have to learn a new camera, since it was the same back and software.

Reviews.Title: great little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: SHERYL GARAFOLA
Reviews.Content: so far so good although have not gone to the beach with it yet. does work well on dry land

Reviews.Title: fun for beach
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: Battery life not great had to charge daily. Never tested the drop shock test. Would use all battery with a few videos.

Reviews.Title: Great travel camera
Reviews.Author: WNCMom06
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take with me on a beach trip and I am extremely pleased with it.  I carried it with me to the beach, submerged it in water several times, tossed it in the sand a few times, and even dropped it on accident once with no damage at all.  It has great durability for my needs.But you don't want a camera just to be durable.  It needs to function well and take great pictures, which this camera does.  I found it to be extremely user-friendly and to offer useful settings.  During my trip I tinkered with several of them and was impressed at the quality.  I can't say it offers professional quality images, but I also wasn't expecting that.  I just wanted it to capture vacation memories clearly and quickly and it did exactly that.  I was also pleased with the life of the battery.  It was great to snap away without worrying about it dying within the hour.Overall I'm pleased with my purchase of this camera.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a simple point-and-shoot camera for on the go.

Reviews.Title: Pictures aren't up to par.
Reviews.Author: Blairchild
Reviews.Content: I am underwhelmed by this camera. The pictures it takes aren't great. They aren't awful, but they aren't nice. The waterproof and shockproof properties are the only redeeming factors. We will only be using this camera around water and buying another camera for everyday pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Vance
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our honeymoon cruise and absolutely loved it. The pictures were great underwater and above! The battery lasted a long time. We were very impressed by this little camera for such a cheap price!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Adrianna R. Bell
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer who owns a couple of expensive, digital SLR cameras.  However, I wasn't comfortable taking those on a canoe trip so I purchased this camera to take instead. Of course, it isn't quite as good as an expensive DSLR but it did a GREAT job for the event.  Not only did it take decent pictures but it was very durable.  I dropped it more than once in the canoe and it flopped around in the water with no issues.  It was definitely worth the investment for capturing pictures during water-related events.  I had an older model that I had used for snorkeling and I loved that one as well.  I can't wait to go snorkeling with this one since it is newer and has a higher resolution than my old one.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Color!!
Reviews.Author: Marion D. Sandridge
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my granddaughter because the one she previously owned was dropped in the ocean (accidently).  I did not know that this one was waterproof.  Low and behold, it is.  Way to go Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE Olympus products!
Reviews.Author: S. Mount
Reviews.Content: I am fairly brutal on cameras, so when my daughter graduated from middle school I bought an Olympus Stylus.  That camera went snorkling in the carribean, tubing down rivers, to the top of the highest skilift in North America (twice), and accompanied me on my wrist through two Warrior Dashes.  When it finally began to go wonky, I knew I wanted another Olympus.  The Tough series had been the 'newest greatest' thing when I'd gotten my Olympus, and had been more expensive than I'd been willing to spend.  Since then, the price has dropped substantually so I went in for it.  It is very intuative, easy to use, and does not have the sliding shutter that sometimes got clogged a little during mudruns. The quality of video is definitely improved from the Stylus, and we are very amused by not one, but TWO "pet modes" where apparently it will automatically take a picture if it detects a cat or dog face.  I'm not sure I'll ever need that, but if you want a worthy rugged little point and shoot to go on all your adventures with at a reasonable price, this is it. (but do invest in an extra battery and charger. It is worth the extra $$ to not have it lose juice at a crucial moment.)

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley R
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I purchased this one because I have a clumsy husband who drops and ruins every camera I have purchased in the past 2 years. This one has held up!

Reviews.Title: Some photo's come out blurred and have white spots... but great effects
Reviews.Author: Boop Boop
Reviews.Content: Not sure why but some of the photos I've taken come out with white dots and most of them are quite blurry even after changing settings. Somewhat cloudy...

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna C. Coulson
Reviews.Content: The batteries in my other camera oozed out and ruined my other digital camera. This is easy to use, compact and light weight.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera, the photos are verry nice I enjoy it!
Reviews.Author: Karen Herrera
Reviews.Content: Thanks! Excelent camera, the photos are verry nice I enjoy it in my vacations and any event with my family

Reviews.Title: Great pictures... too many options
Reviews.Author: Lisa Askins
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, I took some great pictures in Hawaii and was even able to take them underwater when I was swimming with the sea turtles BUT, there are just too many options. I want a camera that automatically adjusts based on the lighting available or the scenery it's scanning. If you need to get that shot quickly - this camera is not the right one. You have to have the right setting already on to take the picture or your scrambling to change it to get the shot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Joey Kot
Reviews.Content: Just started writing reviews so stay with me here. I'm 32, buy a lot of stuff from online usually after I try/read reviews from somewhere else.Pros: Cheap, Good pictures (not DSLR quality) decent videoCons: Bad screen - I mean terrible. (screen quality is like a 2.1 mp camera!), can't see the screen in the sun,  Flash is really bright and grainy photos at night.I was overall happy with this camera. I own a cannon DSLR and a cannon point and shoot camera and bought this solely for a trip to Mexico. I went on a trip to Jamaica last year and spent about 80 bucks on water proof disposable cameras and film development. We decided to look into a waterproof digital camera just for the water shots and this camera worked great. It took great photos on sunny days and under water with the reefs and pool/beach.I had no issues with water leakage in the battery compartment like other have had. The camera was fine while i was running it in about 2-3 feet of water, and i'd always try to keep it above water if I could just in case. I figure if you take care of something, it probably helps prolong the life.  I was happy with the performance and price of the camera.

Reviews.Title: very good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Ana Lee
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera, its tough and I took it all over switzerland with me. Takes great pictures for a point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Kayak
Reviews.Content: This point & shoot takes compatible pictures to my Nikon 3100 SLR. The F stop selector where you see the picture at that f stop is genius ! The only thing I can complain about is that after 3hrs the battery was almost dead. Cut it off between shots and that problem is resolved. At this price it's a steal!

Reviews.Title: toss it around
Reviews.Author: D. Chin "Facilities"
Reviews.Content: the camera is shock proof since it falls out of family member hands all the time.  since it has no movable parts (all internal) there is nothing to break.  make sure the SD card and battery compartment is double clicked into camera or warranty for waterproof is void.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: gene coleman
Reviews.Content: The camera meets all requirments plus some can take pictures in the rain .Our inspectors like them of the fact there is no moving part to worry about.

Reviews.Title: Simple operation
Reviews.Author: John Miller
Reviews.Content: Been using for one month. Works great,simple instructions. Produces good quality pictures. This is good value for the money . No problem in recommending this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Durable
Reviews.Author: Winter High
Reviews.Content: I use this in a warehouse setting and it has held up the longest of all the cameras we have had.

Reviews.Title: Great...!
Reviews.Author: Luis Salazar Bogantes
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.. Great definition... No shake pictures even in a car moving... Is a great option... And one of the best purchases...

Reviews.Title: This Camera is Waterproof
Reviews.Author: Christophe Panetier "Panetier"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take underwater shots of our swim team (Yes, they were aware!), and it does a very good job...or is it that the photographer did a good job?  That's the mental tug of war i have entered into.  So I have decided that the camera has done okay, and I have done great!  There I feel better now.  It's easy to use, but next time I really must wear my contacts so I can see what I'm shooting.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my purse
Reviews.Author: Loreta Hestand
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a back up for my purse. I know most of us have cameras on our phones, but they do not have the same quality as a Olympus. A+ on quality and easy of use.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Clark Enersen
Reviews.Content: Have about 6 or 7 of these "Tough" models for my office.We have lots of employees that go on site to our projects and these cameras get tossed in the vehicle/Backpack/bag.  Are there better point and shoots with more features, sure but the selling point for me is the "tough" aspect ( they just keep working ).  I have had some of these models for close to 5 years and they are still in service through rain, snow, full sun or complete darkness ( pictures from dark mechanical rooms/tunnels in buildings ).4 stars because this one does not come with a Wall charger ( have to pull the camera in to charge it which requires opening the door for access to the battery and memory card ).

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Bought these for my boys (9 & 11) since they wanted something waterproof. We went under the falls at Niagara Falls with thier Sony cameras last year and it messed them up.I've seen reviews of these type camera claiming the photo quality was poor but we have had great pictures even indoors with low light! Which is where they take most of thier pics.Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Works amazing and takes stunning pictures!
Reviews.Author: Gareth toton
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for almost a year now, and so far it's worked great! I live about two blocks from Lake Michigan, so it's seen its fair share of underwater use. I also live near lots of forested areas so I take a lot of photos of nature and family in nature and it works wonderfully! Really, I have some really great photos. I even used it for my trip back from California and got outstanding panoramas of Yellowstone, Yosemite and SO much more. A wonderful camera, and I love that it plugs right in to the TV so I can show off all the cool pictures! The only thing I want is a manually adjustable focus, but that's really not something that keeps me up at night :)

Reviews.Title: Worst ever
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two of the Olympus Tough cameras specifically for the underwater ability. The first one I thought broke maybe because I had done something wrong so I purchased another one because I loved it so much but then the second one broke. Please do not purchase this camera.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: D Royal
Reviews.Content: this camera takes really great pictures, is very rugged and has a good price. would recommend to anyone looks for a tough camera

Reviews.Title: Buy it!
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Great product! Everything I hoped it would be. Waterproof, dustproof, light in weight and the perfect color for my mom.

Reviews.Title: cute
Reviews.Author: amanda parker
Reviews.Content: I like this camera ok I think I really need to read the manual because it has sooo many differnt features  that I have no idea how to use

Reviews.Title: Great surfer camera
Reviews.Author: Ken Haff
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the dollar.  Was a present for my surfer daughter and has performed to perfection.  Absolutely no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: great camera I didn't lock my other camera, and water got inside, I consider it a blessing, because this one is so much faster.Takes great pics and now all my friends want one too!

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: K. Barnes
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas Gift for my Father-in-Law.  He dropped his last one, so we figured a shock-proof camera would be a good bet.  I own a previous incarnation of Olympus' waterproof camera, and have had good service with it, making this a no-brainer.  The water-proof/dust-proof features should be of benefit when he is out on a ride, too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Chell
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this camera it has a lot of neat options on it. This is her second camera she had her other for 6years.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pics
Reviews.Author: Sally Vann
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures in and out of the water. It is built very well and tuff. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Vanuza
Reviews.Content: i had low expectation due to all the negetive comments... but i.will.most certaintly keep reposting on this after months of usage. so far i dropped it, and played boat with it in the bath tub.. and it works, jk didnt do all tht but its small and i did get it wet, so it fits my purposes. made to be a swimming buddy. the only downer is i sort of hope it was going to be more red, then orange. but ok atleast it wont blend in with the water

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: alex Dahik
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera, the fact that you can take pictures under water its amazing, and the fact that is shock proof its even better

Reviews.Title: Great find!
Reviews.Author: SusieQ
Reviews.Content: Awesome product!! Takes great pictures. Ships fast as well. I have taken tons of underwater photos and cant wait to take more!!

Reviews.Title: Better than most
Reviews.Author: mr. william b. harris jr.
Reviews.Content: I found the Touch series to be far superior to any other off the shelf product for dust, water and shock resistance. I will say that the Stylus models prior were just as great but I would recommend the higher numbers in the series for better photo options.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, horrible battery life
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Martin
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The close-ups are amazing and why I mainly use it. The battery life, however, is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Great until it broke
Reviews.Author: DrMom
Reviews.Content: Wonderful out of water and in the pool, but we took it snorkeling in Hawaii and 5 pictures in the camera died. Very dissapointing. When we got back to land and went to check the battery we found seawater inside. NOT WATERPROOF in ocean water apparently. I've asked for a return/replacement - didn't work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Love, Love, Love it! Took it to Cozumel Mexico took great picture under water and out. Easy to use, I have 3 other under water cameras so I know it's just hard taking pictures under water but over 1/2 came out great. That' not bad for me, currents, moving fish, turtles, etc. stretch my skills.( All my star fish pictures were FAB! they don't move). Really easy to work, still, movie, sound all worked well for me. I hope you like it too. P.S. Remember to buy the float wrist all cameras sink!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chrissi Stoughton "chrissi"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a replacement for my old one a few yrs ago. It suddenly stopped working after scuba diving. Same camera just an updated version. Would purchase again

Reviews.Title: Great Camera !!!!
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my cruise and so far i have taken it to the pool about 5 times and it works great. It takes great pictures &  the features are fun.  Cant wait to take it on my cruise !!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Antolic
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about a month now. I tested it out underwater and the pictures came out crystal clear. I am taking it to the lake next week and am excited about taking pictures without worrying about my camera getting wet. I rinse it off under the sink water like it says in the instructions after I use it underwater or in dusty areas, and it cleans up great. I suggest getting a microfiber lens cloth to use to wipe watermarks off the lens, though, so that your pictures outside the water are also clear. All in all, I'm very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: alan
Reviews.Content: The battery is not working properly and we have only had it for 2 months. We couldn't return it because the time has just run out to return. Not worth the money. Disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Poor photo quality
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very poor quality images, it really only does well with the flash on. It is unable to capture action images, even with the settings adjusted to sport mode. All of my shots without the flash ended up blurry. Also, the user interface is confusing and the buttons make it move very slowly. Overall, I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Ruined 2 vacations
Reviews.Author: kelib
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last year for a vacation to Roatan. The first day snorkeling I started to see bubbles coming from the housing around the shutter. Removed the battery and it was destroyed. No pictures from this vacation except taken from phone.Got new  replacement camera and took it down with me again. I did not originally trust the camera so I kept it in a waterproof bag but was not happy with the pictures taken through the bag. On my last day I decided what would be the chances of getting another defective camera. 5 minutes in the water the same thing happend and camera shorted out. These leaks were not where you would close the camera so it had nothing to do with the seal. I took out battery and memory card right away and they were both dry. The issue was somewhere in the housing.I am not going to even waste my time trying to replace or repair this camera. 2 cameras and both did the same thing, and I was only snorkeling on top of the water, it maybe went down to 2' below the surface.I thought Olympus was a good camera, not anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Charlotte L. Seago
Reviews.Content: This camera took decent pictures in and out of the swimming pool for a few times.  Then I took it in the ocean and it leaked.  Sent it in to Olympus and was replaced with a new one.  First time in the pool this one leaked.  I have just sent the second one in.  Quite a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Alissa Hoyt
Reviews.Content: Got it about a month ago. Used it at a pool party, in the pool and then took it to Europe as a back up. Camera works great. Pictures have come out fabulous so far. In and out of the water. Camera keeps a charge all day - and has a super easy to use panoramic feature.For the money i paid, this camera is a winner!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after second day in the water
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Glavin
Reviews.Content: This product is not waterproof!  I followed directions and soaked the camera after using it in the water.  The next day I was taking underwater pictures and it stopped.  I opened the battery compartment and the battery had leaked corrosive material inside the camera.I have the TG820 and I absolutely love it, but this model is a piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: good camera but takes terrible pictures
Reviews.Author: Samantha Smets
Reviews.Content: The quality of the camera is good, very durable but the picture quality is terrible. I wish I would have bought another Nikon. It is definitely water proof but i havent offically tried it out yet, just put it in a bowl of water like it tells you to when you first get it. Again, very durable camera but if you love your pictures like i do..then get another brand because this one doesnt produce good pictures at all and the zoom doesnt go far at all either

Reviews.Title: Worked as advertised.
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: I used the camera twice in saltwater in Maui. I did not take the camera deeper than 5 feet. Good pictures especially without zoom and objects within 1 - 2 feet. Every time I opened the cover to expose the battery and cable ports, I cleaned the seal with a cotton swab to make sure no sand or even lint could impair the water resistance.

Reviews.Title: can i vote zero stars?
Reviews.Author: M. melde "Ravendancer"
Reviews.Content: this is the worst camera ever. i needed a quick replacement for my Olympus other-model (I forget which exactly) with the image stabilizer option. This one doesn't have Image Stabilization., which I knew when I bought it, but I had no idea the rest of the camera would be so absolutely useless. it can't in the least adjust to any kind of different lighting conditions (it tends to wash everything out), no matter what setting you put it on. most shots come out blurry - defaulting to a low shutter speed, even if you set it to shoot at a high shutter speed. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY on this model, even if it is on sale and it looks like a deal. it's Crap. spend the extra couple hundred dollars on the higher class model of this camera with the Image Stabilizer (sorry, I don't have the model #). that one is indestructible, and i've found most features work brilliantly. Not this one. Real sorry I wasted a dime on this one.

Reviews.Title: Failed in just 15min in  pool water
Reviews.Author: YI YUAN
Reviews.Content: I've used for about 15 min no more than 4 ft underwater (pool) and taken only 20 pictures.Then the camera shut down by itself. Have to get back to the land and wipe out all water on surface. After opening the battery/sd card chamber, there is already a few water drops inside.Not 10ft water proof as advertised at all. Probably it can only shot pictures in the rain, but definitely not for underwater usage.

Reviews.Title: Olympus TG-320
Reviews.Author: thomas gallinaro
Reviews.Content: YOU SHOULD POINT OUT THAT THE SOFTWARE -- DOES NOT WORK WITH  MAC **** thank you and have a nice day

Reviews.Title: Awesome waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: FRANK THE TANK
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome photos underwater and video with sound. Also has a built in speaker so when you review it on the camera you can hear the video. You also can just transfer the video in Itunes to your iphone without anyspecial software- awesome.

Reviews.Title: Olympus TG
Reviews.Author: Dorothy A. Depew
Reviews.Content: Because I tend to drop things, I needed a tough camera.  This one is it!!  I really like it and think we'll be together a long time!

Reviews.Title: did not leak..
Reviews.Author: valtan
Reviews.Content: I took this to my snorkeling tour to Galapagos..... I was able to take pictures inside water or inside the  cave area with high waterlevel.  It did not leak and flash worked always well.This may be a OK camera to take pictures at very wet environment butnot good enough to take reasonably good shots except that.  I ended up taking all other pictures by iphone which was much better...but Iphone has limitation and I miss many chances.  So,  I recommend to take another camera with this if you want totake other better shots.

Reviews.Title: Charger & cable not working
Reviews.Author: Tim Murphy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my daughter's birthday. The charger or charging cable doesn't work. Luckily, the camphost  where we are campiing used his smart phone charger and cable to charge the camera.I am disappointed with the hassle of either contacting Olypus for a replacement or returning the whole camera to Amazon. I don't know yet if the charger and cable not working is a sign that camera is faulty but it appears so far to be in working order. I just wish there was a simple way to ask Amazon to replace the charger/cable without returning the camera.I kick myself for not buying the camera at Target because it would have been much easier to return.  My daughter who is 7 years was so excited to receive her first camera. Now, we have to wait……...

Reviews.Title: Worst product buy ever!
Reviews.Author: Subodh Lele
Reviews.Content: I bought this "waterproof" camera from my Hawaii vacation. I used it for snorkeling for two days. On the first day, the fully charged battery last nearly 30 minutes. The next time around, the camera took a few pictures and stopped working after a few minutes. I initially thought that maybe the battery was not fully charged. I later discovered that water had entered the battery/SD card section and ruined the battery. I was snorkeling on both days, so the camera was definitely close to the surface of the water. The strap is pretty lame. I have not yet had a chance to evaluate the quality of the photos..DO NOT BUY is my strong recommendation..

Reviews.Title: wouldn't turn on
Reviews.Author: LLW
Reviews.Content: I decided to give this camera a try. It seemed like a lot of bang for my buck... I got it yesterday, registered the device, and followed the directions to charge and program it. I'm pretty camera savvy, but after reading the reviews for this camera  I didn't want to accidentally ruin my camera because I didn't handle it appropriately. I charged the device for a few minutes and tried to turn it on. This surprised me...no power? I couldn't even tell for sure if the camera was charging. Hopeful, I charged it all night. I tried again this morning, and the device still wouldn't turn on. I tried to call Olympus for customer support, but after waiting for 17 minutes to speak to some one... I gave up. I will be returning this...bummer :(

Reviews.Title: The best underwater camers
Reviews.Author: India Sepulveda
Reviews.Content: My last camera like this lasted 5 years being used by children and under water all the time.  Good photos and fun to use.  Kids ove to see themselves swimming.  This camera was dropped numerous times and still worked.  It eventually goes because of the seals but got the price and 5 years of fun it was worth every penny.  I got a new one when the old one failed and look forward to another 5 years of underwater fun!!

Reviews.Title: This is the best camera I've ever had.
Reviews.Author: Casilia
Reviews.Content: I love this tough little camera! I don't have to worry about dropping it or getting it wet, so now I actually use my camera rather than leaving it safe in a drawer. Boating, hiking, theme parks - it goes everywhere. Furthermore, it takes crystal-clear, vivid pictures despite my shaky hands. I like that I can manually program it, choose a prefab program like "landscape" or "portrait," or use the auto feature.

Reviews.Title: It's not waterproof!!! But Olympus sent a replacement.
Reviews.Author: E. Schnautz
Reviews.Content: Purchased on 2/25/13 and took it on vacation to Hawaii on 3/31/13. It worked fine in the water the first day. Followed the instructions for rinsing and removing sand and salt water. On the third day, water got into the camera despite my having locked and sealed the battery/memory card door.The only reason I chose this camera was that it is supposed to be waterproof--otherwise it's just a little point and shoot. While it worked, the pictures were OK and the video was good too.Needless to say I am very disappointed. I could have returned it to Amazon before 3/29/13, but now I have to rely on Olympus to "repair" it under warranty. I'd like to have my money back.In fairness I will update this review once Olympus has a chance to redeem themselves.This is the third Olympus digital camera I have owned; the others have been superb (the first was a 2.7MP point and shoot and the other a 5.3MP that I still keep around as a backup to my DSLR).*** UPDATE ***Olympus sent a replacement. I mailed the camera to their warranty repair center. Three weeks later I got a brand new unit without further explanation. I am upgrading my review from 1 star to 4 for their prompt customer service and will post again in a few months on whether the camera maintains its impermeability.

Reviews.Title: Olympus TG-320 camera
Reviews.Author: Pame
Reviews.Content: My husband had been looking for a camera he could use for underwater shots. He had priced others that go 30 feet down under the water for 300 dollars. When I found this one that goes 10 feet down, for only a hundred... Well, I jumped on it. He will be taking this with him on his fishing adventures and attempt to photograph the fish... I was very happy to be able to present my husband with this for his birthday!!!

Reviews.Title: no near as good as the 1st one
Reviews.Author: mnt mike
Reviews.Content: has a  (Older) model for years and it was great, this on the battery is terrible, would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: KJMoney
Reviews.Content: So i got this camera mainly for the shockproof factor. I'm really rough on my handheld items. It's zoom isn't that good I'll say that up front but the quality of the pictures is great!  It's got a decent shutter speed and is relativly quick on start up. The battery life is ok I will be purchasing a back up battery for sure! The buttons are a little small but it's a compact camera so you can't get everything you want. For as much as it cost it's a really good camera I would recomend it for sure especialy if you have kids. My 5 year old step son had it when we were fishing and dropped it in the edge of the pond!! It came out just fine! :D

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera
Reviews.Author: arizona photos
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a first time trip to Maui. Snorkling was going to be a big part of it. I knew it was not going to take excellent photos. But the battery life is so poor it died after 1 hour. The image quality was not bad. In fact it was as expected.The reason for the low rating is due to the exceptionally poor battery life.

Reviews.Title: Okay but not great
Reviews.Author: Kathy M Pratt
Reviews.Content: I like the under water feature and pics were good. But the zoom is so limited it's not great got everyday.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: rjs5
Reviews.Content: So far it works fine, just wish I could turn off the video.The camera takes good pictures, we are still getting used to how it operates but overall it works fine for now.

Reviews.Title: olympus waterproof cameras
Reviews.Author: kmc
Reviews.Content: I have had three olympus water proof cameras and they all work fine for a while, but every one of them broke after a year or so. I finally learned my leson to not invest in oylmpus anymore!

Reviews.Title: DID NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Jenneil Guillen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera in march for a vacation in may. I did not think it would be defective so I did not bother checking it out until right before we left. This camera did not even turn on. I bought an extra battery and had charged them both but with no results. I am very disappointed. I am unable to return the item because they only give you 30days from the date of delivery. I am also unable to contact anyone from  customer service because there is no #. I have purchased many items from amazon n this would have been my first return if I was able to return it. I only wanted an exchange but have no choices.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: J. Sarte "jucabiruba"
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LIKE THIS CAMERA, IS A GOOD PRICE FOR A OLYMPUS CAMERA. DID U GOOD JOB FOR UNDERWATER PIX.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: sculpture it
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera.It's claims to be 10 feetWaterproof . It's not 6 inches waterproof. Do not buy yThis camera

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Calvinia Hudson
Reviews.Content: This item was great and I received it on time as prescribed.  I will use your service again.  I got the item for a good price and I didn't have to go from store to store looking for it.  It was cheaper than the stores

2.7-inch LCD display
14 Megapixel
Shockproof (5 Ft)
Freeze proof (14 Deg)
Waterproof (10Ft); Dustproof
